description:
Shy Loff: Chevy and her friends all went to the fields one day until they noticed a shy zooble rolling away, who is identified to be Loff, a Plum flavored Tabby Cat Zooble. Curious, they all decided to to meet her, but due to her shyness, she always runs away from the three even outsmarting the three Zoobles. In a last ditch effort, Chevy, Coron and Panky tried to make her come out of his ball form by tickling her, but also failed, leaving Chevy to call Kumampa for advice.
Coope`s a Lucky Girl?: Ron`s donut shop as just been opened and it attracting a lot of customers, especially Chevy and the group. In the midst, they all met Coope, a Raspberry cheese flavored Giraffe Zooble who is seriously having issues about luck as she gets into all kinds of trouble. After they met Em, he decided to have a hiking trip with his friends, but everything goes wrong due to Coope`s bad luck.

titles.title: Hazukashi Gari ya no Loff / Coope wa Lucky Girl?
Shy Loff / Coope`s a Lucky Girl?
恥ずかしがり屋のロフ / クーペはラッキーガール?
